sentences.en: Builders will then be sent the specifications and asked to submit a tender for the work.
sentences.cn: 建筑商们将会收到说明书，并被邀请参与该项目投标。

sentences.en: Derek has agreed to submit to questioning.
He estimate his income tax bill by extrapolation from figures submit in previous year.
sentences.cn: 他从前几年的报税数字推算出自己应缴的所得税数额.

sentences.en: He looked at Guo Shifu compellingly . He wanted to force him to submit.
sentences.cn: 他眼珠子咄咄逼人地盯住郭世富, 企图逼他屈服.

sentences.en: He was losing the fight but he would not submit.
I had asked everyone to submit questions in advance of the meeting.
sentences.cn: 我已请每个人在会议之前提交问题。

sentences.en: I submit that this should be allowed.
I submit to your superior judgement.
sentences.cn: 我接受你的明智的判断.

sentences.en: I will not submit to such treatment.
sentences.cn: 我不甘心忍受这样的待遇.

sentences.en: In desperation, Mrs. Jones submitted to an operation on her right knee to relieve the pain.
sentences.cn: 绝望中，琼斯夫人不得已接受了一次她右膝的手术以减轻疼痛。

sentences.en: The commission has invited interested parties to submit comments, and these are now pouring in.
sentences.cn: 委员会已邀请各当事方递交意见，现在意见书纷至沓来。

sentences.en: The minority should submit to the majority.
The people had to submit to the new rulers when they lost the war.
sentences.cn: 战败的人们不得不服从新的统治者.

sentences.en: The students must submit themselves to the disciplines at school.
sentences.cn: 学生在学校必须遵守纪律.

sentences.en: They are inviting talented, but unheralded film-makers to submit examples of their work.
sentences.cn: 他们邀请有才气却尚未幸遇伯乐的电影制作人提交作品样本。

sentences.en: They submitted their reports to the chancellor yesterday.
sentences.cn: 他们昨天向财政大臣提交了他们的报告。

words.tran_cn: 连接主句和从句的；从属的
投降；提交（物）；服从；（向法官提出的）意见；谦恭
使服从（subordinate的ing形式）；使成为下级

trans.tran_en: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve
to agree to obey someone or something or to go through a process, especially when you have no choice

trans.tran_cn: 呈送， 提交； 主张， 建议
trans.tran_en: to give a plan, piece of writing etc to someone in authority for them to consider or approve
